TitleEnglish: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife
SummaryEnglish: Akira Tounome is an invisible gentleman who runs a detective agency, and Shizuka Yakō is a mild-mannered human female who works there. Shizuka can always find Akira even when he turns completely invisible. A quiet love begins to blossom between them as the invisible man and blind girl grow closer to each other…
Aliases: Tōmei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fūfu ni Naru Futari
Toumei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fuufu ni Naru Futari
The Invisible Man and the Human Woman: Two People Who Will Soon Become Husband and Wife
